msbt.message: Hey, how'd you sleep last night? This island's SOOO quiet at night, it's almost weird, .I mean, don't get me wrong, I slept like a logbut I wouldn't mind some more action around here!
I was crazy busy on my first day here. I was like an unpackin', stuff-movin' tornado, y'know?But wow, ! Just knowing I'm revving up a whole new life's got me grinning like a total fool!
It's so awesome you're here. I feel like cool stuff kinda just follows you around, y'know?So yeah, don't be a stranger. I wanna know about ALL the wild things you get up to, !
